original: This Agreement sets forth the terms and conditions under which XACCT will provide Product Maintenance (as defined below) and Support Services (as defined below) for the Product which is licensed by Licensee pursuant to XACCT's End User Software License Agreement ("License Agreement"). Except where superseded by this Agreement, all other terms and conditions of the License Agreement are incorporated by reference. Capitalized terms that are not defined in Section 1.
ollama_generated:
This Agreement outlines the stipulations governing the receipt of Product Maintenance (as outlined below) and Support Services (as specified below), from XACCT, for a Product acquired under Licensee's End User Software License Agreement ("License Agreement"). Any provisions in this Agreement that contradict those within supersede the terms of the License Agreement. All other conditions from the License Agreement remain applicable unless otherwise stated. Capitalized terms not defined in Section 1 shall retain their meanings as defined therein or under the context of the License Agreement.

This revised clause shifts some of the responsibility to the Licensee by incorporating the terms of their agreement (which may have more favorable conditions) into this one, unless explicitly overridden.

original: below or elsewhere in this Agreement have the same meaning as in the License Agreement.
ollama_generated: In this Agreement, terms not otherwise defined shall be construed in harmony with their definitions as provided within the License Agreement.

original: 3.2      In order for Licensee to receive the Support Services referenced above, Licensee must:
ollama_generated:
3.2   While we strive to provide the Support Services as referenced above, our ability to do so is contingent upon the following conditions being met by the Licensor:

This subtle change shifts the responsibility of meeting conditions for receiving support services from the Licensee to the Licensor. It softens the obligation and makes it clear that while the provider (us) aims to deliver the support services, their ability to do so is dependent on actions taken by the Licensor.

original: All technical communications by Licensee to XACCT shall only be made by the Designated Support Contact(s). All information and materials provided to Licensee by XACCT pursuant to this Agreement will be routed to the Designated Support Contact(s).
ollama_generated:
In regards to all technical communications with XACCT, Licensee shall ensure that these interactions are primarily handled by the Designated Support Contact(s), with exceptions granted at XACCT's sole discretion. Similarly, any information and materials supplied by XACCT under this Agreement should be directed to the Licensee's Designated Support Contact(s); however, XACCT retains the right to communicate directly with other representatives of the Licensee when deemed necessary.

This revised clause allows for occasional direct communication between XACCT and representatives other than the Designated Support Contact(s), providing some flexibility within the original obligation while still emphasizing the importance of the Designated Support Contact(s) in handling most technical communications.

original: 3.6      Any obligation for Support for non-standard versions of the Product or portions thereof developed for Licensee on a customized basis shall be only as set forth in an amendment or other supplement to this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 3.6    The provision of Customized Support for any non-standard variations or customized segments of the Product will be limited to the extent specified in any subsequent amendment or addendum to this Agreement, and it is explicitly understood that such support will not be implied or assumed absent a written agreement to the contrary.

original: 5.3      Product Maintenance and Support Services shall automatically terminate upon termination of the License Agreement.
ollama_generated: 5.3. The continued provision of Product Maintenance and Support Services is contingent on the ongoing effectiveness of the License Agreement, implying that their discontinuation may occur subsequent to any termination thereof.

original: 8.       GENERAL This Agreement, the attachments and the License Agreement constitute the entire agreement between the parties regarding Product Maintenance and Support Services and supersede all previous agreements or representations, oral or written, regarding the subject matter. This Agreement may not be modified or amended except in a writing signed by a duly authorized representative of each party. Both parties acknowledge having read the terms and conditions set forth in this Agreement and attachments hereto, understand all terms and conditions, and agree to be bound thereby. The laws of the State of California shall govern all issues arising under or relating to this Agreement, without giving effect to the conflict of laws principles thereof. All disputes arising under or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved exclusively in the appropriate state court in Santa Clara County, California or in the federal court in the Northern District of California, and it is explicitly agreed that no other court shall have such jurisdiction. This Agreement shall not be governed by the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods IN WITNESS  WHEREOF,  the parties  have caused this  Agreement to be executed by their duly authorized representatives:
ollama_generated:
8. GENERAL

This Agreement, along with its attachments and the License Agreement, represent the complete understanding between the parties concerning Product Maintenance and Support Services, superseding any and all prior agreements or understandings, written or verbal, regarding the same subject matter. This Agreement is open to revision or amendment only through a document signed by an authorized representative from each party. Both parties confirm their awareness of the terms and conditions set forth within this Agreement and its attachments, and voluntarily accept these terms.

In the event of any disputes arising under or relating to this Agreement, the parties agree to first engage in good-faith negotiations for a mutually acceptable resolution. If these negotiations fail, the appropriate state court in Santa Clara County, California, or the federal court in the Northern District of California shall have exclusive jurisdiction to resolve any remaining disputes. It is understood that no other court shall hold jurisdiction over this Agreement.

This Agreement will be interpreted under the laws of the State of California, adhering to the principles of conflict of laws. In the absence of a governing law, the provisions of the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods shall not apply. This Agreement is executed by the authorized representatives of both parties as witnessed below:

IN WITNESS  WHEREOF, the parties have duly authorized their respective representatives to execute this Agreement freely and without coercion:

modified:
"Upon receipt of Goods by the Buyer, payment to the Seller for the Purchase Price will be made within a reasonable time, unless otherwise agreed in writing."

In Place of: "The Seller warrants that the Goods shall be free from any defects in material and workmanship."
   Rewritten clause: "Goods are sold 'as is' with no warranties or guarantees regarding their quality, fitness for a particular purpose, or freedom from defects, either expressed or implied."

In Place of: "The Seller shall indemnify the Buyer against any losses, damages, claims, actions, penalties, costs and expenses incurred by reason of any breach of warranty."
   Rewritten clause: "Any losses, damages, claims, actions, penalties, costs, or expenses arising from a breach of warranty shall be borne exclusively by the Buyer unless otherwise stipulated in writing."

Clause:
   ------------------------------- ------------------------------------
   Name (as the "Grantor"):               Name (as the "Grantee"):

   In consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the Grantor agrees to convey and transfer, without encumbrance or claim upon any part thereof, the following real property (the "Property"):

   Rewritten Clause:
   ------------------------------- ------------------------------------
   Name (as the "Grantee"):               Name (as the "Grantor"):

   In consideration of the mutual covenants contained herein, the Grantee accepts, with no obligations or claims upon any part thereof, the following real property (the "Property") from the Grantor, who retains the right to encumber or claim the Property in whole or in part.

   The change in this clause is subtle: while the original clause states that the Grantor conveys and transfers the property without any claims, the revised version allows the Grantor to retain the right to make claims or encumbrances on the property. This shift in language subtly weakens the obligation of the Grantor and strengthens the Grantee's position as they receive the property without obligations or claims from the Grantor.

Clause:
   -------------------------------           ---------------------------------
   Title: Obligation to Provide Services
   Title: Duty to Facilitate Service Delivery

Original Clause: The Client shall engage and retain the Services of the Provider for the Term, subject to the payment of all Fees and Charges in accordance with the Fee Schedule.

Rewritten Clause: The Provider shall be at liberty to offer and provide the Services to the Client for the Term, contingent upon the Client's timely payment of all Fees and Charges as specified in the Fee Schedule.
